Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Bunny \Bun"ny\, n. (Mining) A great collection of ore without any vein coming into it or going out from it. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Bunny \Bun"ny\, n. A pet name for a rabbit or a squirrel. [1913 Webster] ||
bunny n 1: a young waitress in a night club whose costume includes a rabbit-tail and ears [syn: {bunny girl}] 2: (usually informal) especially a young rabbit [syn: {bunny rabbit}]
